title: Deduplicate shared data files across skills
description: Multiple CSV/YAML/JSON files are duplicated across skills: domain-complexity.csv (2 copies), project-types.csv (2 copies), excalidraw-library.json (5 copies), excalidraw-templates.yaml (5 copies). Should consolidate into a shared location.

title: Add BMB (BMad Builder) module
description: Repeat TEA integration pattern: add BMB to UPSTREAM_SOURCES, sync content, create SKILL.md files, update plugin.json and agent delegation.

title: Phase 2: Add TEA as external module
Verify isHidden workaround for skill autocomplete
description: Test whether the isHidden field in plugin.json commands actually controls /slash autocomplete visibility (anthropics/claude-code#17271). Confirm all 34 skills appear when typing /bmad-. If workaround no longer works, investigate alternatives.
close_reason: Workaround does not work for autocomplete on macOS CLI. Commented: https://github.com/anthropics/claude-code/issues/17271#issuecomment-3823235496

title: Define release strategy for multi-upstream updates
description: Publishing a new plugin version for every upstream release creates excessive churn. Define a batching or scheduling strategy: e.g., periodic releases, grouping upstream updates, or only releasing on core bumps. Also consider automation via GitHub Actions.

title: Evaluate BMAD module system alignment
description: Upstream BMAD now uses modular architecture: core + bmm bundled, external modules (TEA, CIS, GDS, BMB) as separate repos. Our plugin is flat with no module distinction. Need to decide whether to mirror upstream modular approach or keep flat structure.

title: Add CIS (Creative Intelligence Suite) module
description: Repeat TEA integration pattern: add CIS to UPSTREAM_SOURCES, sync content, create SKILL.md files, update plugin.json and agent delegation.

title: Clean up upstream file structure
description: Review and adjust how .upstream/ directories, version files, and sync configs are organized. Current structure may need changes as more modules are added. Investigate during implementation.

title: Implement per-project BMAD config
description: Upstream designs for per-project config (_bmad/config.yaml) with user preferences (name, language, skill level), project metadata (name, type, output paths), and generated manifests. Plugin has no config system implemented yet.

title: Add GDS (Game Dev Studio) module
description: Repeat TEA integration pattern: add GDS to UPSTREAM_SOURCES, sync content, create SKILL.md files, update plugin.json and agent delegation.

title: Decide multi-upstream versioning strategy
description: With multiple upstreams (core, TEA, future CIS/GDS/BMB), the current core-anchored versioning needs a clear decision. Questions: How do we communicate which upstream versions are included? Should .upstream-version-* files drive version metadata? How does plugin version relate to individual module versions? Document the decision.

title: Add upstream dependency badges to README
description: Show upstream dependency versions in README with one badge per row for clarity. Each row shows module name, tracked version, and upstream repo link. Makes it immediately visible which upstream versions the plugin bundles.

title: Fix bmad-master delegation table
description: Delegation table in plugins/bmad/agents/bmad-master.md is out of sync with actual agents. Changes needed: replace tea (Murat) with quinn, update barry reference to match quick-flow-solo-dev, add missing quinn entry.
